titleStmt.title: The engagement or declaration of the officers and souldiers of the County Palatine of Lancaster. Together with their letter to the reverend ministers of the several hundreds of that county, desiring them to publish the said declaration in their parish churches. As also the present state and condition of that county, certified in a letter to a well-affected citizen in London.

notesStmt.note: Declaring their adhesion to the Solemn League and Covenant; protesting against Toleration, etc.-- Thomason catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
